eng: Come let us kneel down, let us ask Christ our God.
Come let us kneel down, let us beseech Christ our King.
Come let us kneel down, let us entreat Christ our Savior.
O Lord Jesus Christ, the Word of God, our God, through the intercessions of St. Mary, preserve us, and bring us to a good start. Have mercy on us according to Your will forever.
The night has passed away; we thank You, O Lord, and we ask You to keep us this day away from sin and deliver us.
